metadata.title: CVE-2018-1279 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Pivotal RabbitMQ for PCF, all versions, uses a deterministically generatedcookie that is shared between all machines when configured in amulti-tenant cluster. A remote attacker who can gain information about thenetwork topology can guess this cookie and, if they have access to theright ports on any server in the MQ cluster can use this cookie to gainfull control over the entire cluster.

criterions.comment: rabbitmq-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
